commit message:
Use ACTION_PICK to select Gravatar photo

The popup chooser (camera or gallery) is more user friendly than the more generic 'Documents' that pops up when using ACTION_GET_CONTENT.

Set the Intent action instead of overwriting it

Which also makes it clear that the code uses ACTION_GET_CONTENT and not ACTION_PICK in this case.

Merge pull request #3928 from wordpress-mobile/feature/gravatar-upload-okhttp

Gravatar image update
